------=_NextPart_000_0091_01C0F2B0.AB74D360
Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

Okay, I'll spill the beans on Slaughter's abilty.  Okay, here goes.  Okay, =
I got it.  Okay, get ready.  Okay, I say okay a lot.  Okay?  Okay!  Okay, h=
ere goes.  Okay, I said thay already, so I'll just say it all now.  Damn, I=
'm serious, I cant stop saying okay!  DAMN!  *slaps self silly for 45 minut=
es straight!*  Whew, oka--THERE I GO AGAIN!   *holds breath for 20 minutes.=
....nearly dies*  No more okays!  Okay?  Doh!

  See, Skulletron had a spec=
ial mental ability, he had the ability to connect his mind with others' min=
ds, and see what they are thinking, without them knowing.  They wouldn't kn=
ow that he connected with their minds unless he told them, or they figured =
out some other way like that.  And, here's the part that his ability is all=
 about, or that he has mostly used it for.  Some of his victims have been Z=
ardus(by request), and two other characters named Ga-I forget, and BrightBl=
ade.  And also, Skulletron used it,(sorry I did that without notice guys, w=
ho remember that!) to sort of gain access to everything, codes, cameras, on=
 the CF.  And now, I'm gonna use it again, on Motormaster!  Muahaha!  Don't=
 worry, it's not THAT devastating...Unless I made Skulle-er-Slaughter, make=
 Motormaster commit suicide(or convince him.)  See, he can display images a=
nd sounds to try and change one's emotions and feelings about something or =
somebody.  He made two people fall in love by displaying images of hearts a=
round one person, and stuff.  And, when Zardus asked him to, Skulletron eve=
ntually made Zardus give off a little giggle, by displaying (corny) humorou=
s things.  Now, in my next post, tell what Motormaster feels.....
